Visit the Summit website: http://www.DefendingTheDream.org
October 4th and 5th The Mayflower Hotel Washington, DC
Join grassroots activists from across the country as we descend on the nation’s capital to demonstrate to presidential candidates, elected officials, and the national media that there exists a real and powerful national movement focused on reining in the out-of-control government spending and taxation that threatens our very freedom and prosperity.
Speakers Include:
Fred Thompson, Presidential Candidate
Mitt Romney, Presidential Candidate
John Stossel, ABC's 20/20
Dinesh D'Souza, Bestselling Author
Ron Paul, Presidential Candidate
Michael Steele, Chairman GOPAC
Senator Tom Coburn, Oklahoma
Robert Cochran, Producer of FOX's hit show "24"
Congressman Jeff Flake, Arizona
John Fund, Wall Street Journal
Herman Cain, Author / Media Commentator
For a full list of speakers, please visit http://www.DefendingTheDream.org
1. Lower Taxes
2. Limited Government
3. An end to out-of-control government spending
cause.mission: protecting the American Dream from the policies threaten our very freedom and prosperity
